definition: drawing a comparison in order to show a similarity in some respect
details:
noun
- drawing a comparison in order to show a similarity in some respect
= example: drawing a comparison in order to show a similarity in some respect
- an inference that if things agree in some respects they probably agree in others
- the religious belief that between creature and creator no similarity can be found so great but that the dissimilarity is always greater
= example: the religious belief that between creature and creator no similarity can be found so great but that the dissimilarity is always greater
= synonyms: doctrine of analogy
